storyInfo: Maria has a good duel with the Flametail Knight, and finally earns some good points. At the same time, however, Zofia gets some bad news.

attributes.content: And eight remain—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No, remain? Flip that around, almost half the Knights in the field have already exited due to injuries!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Wait—as I was saying that, it looks like 'Hoarhair' has taken a point off 'Springwater'—oh! And 'Drifter' Dorka barges in to pick them off! Now that's what I call productive!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Everyone pulling moves on everyone else—this is the glamor of the Fireblade Melee, folks! 24-carat violence!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Light, heed me—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That's all you're capable of? How the hell did you beat Ingra?!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Your swordhand... is nothing compared to my auntie's!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Heh, I'll tear you right off that scoreboard, 'Nearl!' Watch this!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Ah—behind you!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Uagh—?!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Fancy seeing you again, young Nearl. You've got nowhere to run now.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: And right after 'Gałązka' comes 'Flametail'! Whoa, way-way-way, how many times has someone come for the Nascent Nearl now? You gotta get your own show, Maria!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: God, I hate that guy. You're too loud!
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Anyway, we're running out of foes to fight. Looks like we finally get to size each other up, right?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: —If all we're doing is measuring, I'll gladly keep you company.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ooh. Not bad. Your eyes got a lot better since you messed up Plastic.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Hup—
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: One blink. Open. Shut.
(Below?!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Gugh—?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ohh? Dodged that, did you?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: (What did she do just now...? She wasn't that fast—more like just too dexterous...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ahh. I see how you held up for so long against Ingra and Szewczyk now... you've got a better foundation than I thought.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Whislash taught you all of that, huh?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Nn-huh. You've got a sharp eye too. You know, you learn pretty quick.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: And now you're down one point. I think me and this format are gonna get along just fine.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Keep on like this, and every point you got from capping Plastic's gonna go down the drain, you know that?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Hnnfh—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Urrrrraaahhh! You stinking little squirrel—!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Can't you just lie down and bite it for one second?!
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Hah! Knocked away your weapon! What are you gonna do now, huh?!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Just pick them back up?! Dumbass!
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Don't waste your breath! You'll meet your end right here!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: —Watch out!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What the hell? Arts—no, you can't be, you're not even armed!
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: No, you... you... you can't be—
attributes.name: 'Gałązka' Knight

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Jeez, Louise...! What a good day to earn some free points... Alright, where were we, little Nearl?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: (Here she comes again—!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: D'ja know? Fun fact, I'm Infected.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Huh? Infecte—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And another point. It is SO easy to distract you.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: ...But when you said Infected, you weren't just saying it, right?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You used your Arts directly just now...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Isn't it a shame?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: You mean?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: When the Blood Knight took the title, they went 'yeah, we'll officially let Infected be knights'—but when the Radiant Knight got infected, they chased her completely out of Kazimierz. Doesn't that suck?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Your debut battle was at the Roar Arena, right? All you needed to do was take your paperwork to the Knights Association, sign for your tournament credentials, and then head backstage to gear up...
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Do you know how much—how MUCH—an Infected has to do to get here?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: They think it's funny to lock you in a cage of gloompincer first. They think it's funny to make you trample the blood of other Infected, leaving one footprint at a time... they make you win back your humanity, to prove you're a normal, living, breathing person.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Welcome to the bottom line. They weren't gonna give the Infected any respect for a single second. 'Just throw them into the machine. Make them one more symbol of our progress.'
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: ...Don't you think I have the right to hate it?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Our sights are set on every noble knight who thinks her opinion means the world... we'll go under their own rules, cut them right where it hurts.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Honestly, I'm not here to knock you out of the game... after all, I respect the Radiant Knight from the bottom of my heart. Being Infected doesn't sway me there.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Let's call the points I've already taken a fee, and here's a lesson on behalf of 'Whislash.' From the match where you beat Ingra, I can tell you still don't understand what the actual significance of the Major is.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Blind enthusiasm? Riding your own efforts, tuning all the warning signs out? In any ideal scenario, worst is you'd fall flat on your face. But this is the Major. That'll kill you.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Keep it up. Whatever.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Light? Same thing as when you beat Ingra...
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: —Hiyaah!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Are you kidding?!
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: That's one point back, Flametail!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Goddamn. Didn't think you were so stupid thirsty for it—
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: —But hey, now you look like the Radiant Knight's sister!
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: We step back, put some distance between us. Our blades face off again.
...This feels strange.
We just talked a little, simple as that. Facing her, I can't feel any of the same immense, nauseating pressure Szewczyk and Ingra had... is it just because of her nature?
Yet she's so strong. Ngh. And fast. And masterful.
You're smiling? You're that confident?
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: ...Am I?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Eh. Give it a try and you'll find out.
attributes.name: Passing Fan

attributes.content: Alright, then...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaand—! Tiiiiiiiime!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We stop in our tracks as soon as we hear the announcer.
By just a hair—by just the slightest hair, we could've been touching the other's armor.
Lightly, like she's just messing with me, 'Flametail' taps against my shield.
Maybe you'd have taken one more point off me here. Maybe not. Who can say, Maria?
attributes.name: 'Flametail' Knight

attributes.content: Could've been two, maybe.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hahahaha—you know, from the stands, it's hard to tell just how fiercely stubborn you are, Nearlie.
attributes.name: 'Flametail' Knight

attributes.content: And our refs are finished judging! At the end of this free-for-all, only four remained standing!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Yo, audience! Here's the deciding moment your wallets have been waiting for! Even if your favorite knight started out getting knocked around six ways from Sunday, don't you lose the light! The Arena's here to welcome you back any time!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Fourth place! Earning ten points, the arena was his to walk, and he avoided almost any direct battle! Our survivor with smarts, 'Gałązka' Daniel!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Third place! Hunted by the whole arena since the word go, and without a moment to breathe, she might be our biggest winner on the points exchange tonight! Our dainty, charming independent knight, Maria Nearl!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Second place! In the starting skirmishes, he beat three knights with his own hands! He made the arena's corner his own with his tremendous shields! The walking fortress, 'Limestone' Marko!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And our champion tonight, with twenty-two fresh points to her name! A near uninterrupted combo of victories! The super-rookie who never drags her feet—'Flametail' Sona!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And that win of hers means a mean mountain of money, so let's make some mega noise—! Coming up! We'll be announcing the lottery draws for each prize pool! Tonight, while the knights strike the sky, the audience strikes it big! All at the Fireblade Arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ah, welcome, dear Miss.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Having the fortune to meet the youngest ever to join the Kazimierz Armorless Union, the mighty Platinum, I admit that I, humble Czarny, am profoundly terrified.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Uh, can we not with the niceness, Spokesman, sir. You're the ones who yelled for me anyway, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hardly, hardly. I'm merely the General Chamber's mouthpiece, working as its directors will it. How could I dare think to command the mighty Platinum?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You say that, but, like, two of them are just busy and then the three above make everyone else do all the work forever, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ugh, this sucks... I hate overtime. I already had enough work before you called me... Seriously, I wanna go on vacation to Sami once the Major's done.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: As long as the General Chamber agrees, I can arrange you a Sami countryside villa right this moment.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I gotta wait until work's over, thoughhh—
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: —What do you want the Armorless Union to do?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: We have many problems on our hands, dear Miss. Infected out of line, curious rumors, knights drawing a little too much attention...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: But I trust that at the nod of the mighty Platinum of the Armorless Union, none of these will be a problem at all.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I'm back! Where's the chef? Let's get him going!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: He's got a big meal to make tonight, and Maria'll be here soon... she needs a feast and then some! Don't say it was me who called for it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Madam Zofia, you have a guest. One who claims urgent business with you.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: A guest? Now?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: They can wait until Maria's back—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah... apologies, Zofia, for coming uninvited...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You're the one who... *sigh*... I remember you had your own little company, and then you broke into my place like this, thinking you'd make off with all my sponsorship rights.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Well, out with it. What now?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I, uh, there's some... I have some info here... probably some of it's rumors...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But don't tell anyone! True or false, the event plans here are all top, top secret...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But I think you've guessed that already... just treat this as me paying you back... and, uh, I hope things turn out well for you...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I haven't seen a good knight in a long time... who had a happy ending.
attributes.name: Corporate Employee
